name: coalition-transparency-suite
description: Government transparency investigation skills - surveillance technology that points cameras UP the power hierarchy to monitor those who hold power, not citizens

plugins.name: facility-lease-investigation
plugins.description: Government real estate corruption detection methodology. Use when investigating suspiciously high facility lease costs, potential conflicts between lessors and government officials, or market rate deviations.

plugins.name: anti-palantir-osint-pipeline
plugins.description: Automated transparency data collection system - surveillance technology reversed to monitor power holders. Includes Legistar scraping, OpenFEC integration, PostgreSQL storage, Neo4j relationship mapping, and Spiderfoot deep investigation.

plugins.name: vendor-concentration-analysis
plugins.description: Contractor favoritism and bid rigging detection using HHI calculations, threshold gaming detection, campaign finance cross-referencing, and statistical significance testing.

plugins.name: cost-allocation-plan-review
plugins.description: Federal fund fraud detection via CAP manipulation identification. 2 CFR Part 200 compliance testing, allocation base reasonableness assessment, and comparative benchmarking methodology.

plugins.name: foia-template-generation
plugins.description: Optimized public records request generation with jurisdiction-specific law citations, document specificity techniques, fee waiver justifications, and complete example templates.

categories.name: Government Transparency
categories.description: Tools for investigating government corruption and holding power accountable

categories.name: Investigation
categories.description: Methodologies for detecting corruption, fraud, and conflicts of interest

categories.name: OSINT & Data Collection
categories.description: Automated data collection and relationship mapping

categories.name: Public Accountability
